qoute: Dictators can always consolidate their tyranny by an appeal to patriotism.
Each nation feels superior to other nations. That breeds patriotism - and wars.
I realize that patriotism is not enough. I must have no hatred or bitterness towards anyone.
I think patriotism is like charity - it begins at home.
Patriotism is a arbitrary veneration of real estate above principles.
Patriotism is an ephemeral motive that scarcely ever outlasts the particular threat to society that aroused it.
Patriotism is easy to understand in America; it means looking out for yourself by looking out for your country.
Patriotism is not a short and frenzied outburst of emotion but the tranquil and steady dedication of a lifetime.
Dictators can always consolidate their tyranny by an appeal to patriotism.

I realize that patriotism is not enough. I must have no hatred or bitterness towards anyone.
I think patriotism is like charity - it begins at home.
Patriotism is a arbitrary veneration of real estate above principles.

Patriotism is easy to understand in America; it means looking out for yourself by looking out for your country.
Patriotism is not a short and frenzied outburst of emotion but the tranquil and steady dedication of a lifetime.
Patriotism is the last refuge of a scoundrel.
Patriotism is the last refuge of the scoundrel.
Patriotism is the last refuge of the scoundrel.
Patriotism is the virtue of the vicious.
Patriotism is the willingness to kill and be killed for trivial reasons.
Patriotism is the willingness to kill and be killed for trivial reasons.
Patriotism is your conviction that this country is superior to all other countries because you were born in it.
Patriotism is your conviction that this country is superior to all others because you were born in it.
Patriotism must be founded on great principals and supported by great virtue.
The ''Communism'' of the English intellectual is something explicable enough. It is the patriotism of the deracinated.
You will never have a quiet world until you knock the patriotism out of the human race.
You'll never have a quiet world till you knock the patriotism out of the human race.
You're not supposed to be so blind with patriotism that you can't face reality. Wrong is wrong, no matter who says it.
Patriotism is a pernicious, psychopathic form of idiocy.
